segments.text: Hi , I think I was supposed to call for my test results today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you go onto our website and put in your password , you can access your test results .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you saying that there weren â€™ t any problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will always have you come in for a discussion if there is a major problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I be able to read the results on the website and understand them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if you go there , you can see what each test is about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How will I know what the numbers mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can see your results and how they compare to the normal range .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can I see test results from tests I have taken before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We put all of your test results up in the same place . Just check the dates for what you need .
segments.speaker: S2
